name: Wipe Them Out
description:
Overview:

As the theme of the jam was Rock - Paper - Scissors, the game was designed to implement these features as player abilities in a 3D top-down action game. 

Player will play the role of a hairstylist, whose goal is to obtain the Golden Scissors to save his/her hair salon as well as advancing his/her career. 

At the time of submitting the game for the jam, it featured a short and simple level with only zombies as enemies and a little puzzle at the end of the level. 

Game controls:

  • Movement: W A S D || Arrow Keys || USB Joystick Controller Left Stick/ D-pad
  • Melee Attack (Scissors): Left mouse button || Left Ctrl || USB Joystick Controller Button 0
  • Ranged Attack (Rock): Right mouse button || Left Alt || USB Joystick Controller Button 1 
  • Special Spell (Paper): Middle mouse button || Left Shift || USB Joystick Controller Button 2
  • Pause: Esc || USB Joystick Controller Button 9

Tip: Use one of the three abilities to unlock the door at the end of the level. 

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 154 from June 19, 2020 to June 25, 2020.
